tool_description: a simple api to process your audio files
name: audio processor
title: audio processor

api_list.name: get file
api_list.description: this endpoint gives you the result
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-processor.p.rapidapi.com/static/755a60c5-5845-4e5c-b7f1-5610d79986ee/output_1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-processor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-processor.p.rapidapi.com/static/{ref}/{output}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-processor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get status
api_list.description:
this endpoint should return file splitting task status 
if the splitter completed it returns the files paths
else return STILL_PROCESSING
